token_info.name: Material of emotions
token_info.description: "Material of emotions" 2017 Concept-series of abstract sculptures based on nanomaterials, reflecting emotions and intimacy, reacting to touch and images of geometric shapes, the contrast of soft plastic and clear geometry. This study is about the materials of the future, about shaping and the ability to create "living" paints, biologically active sensory polymeric materials such as "online clay". Author Vlas Belov. 3d file glb. Link to the site http://vlasbelov.tilda.ws/page16098701.html
